title: Smart Data Models - ITinfrastructure / LowLevelOrchestrator
description: A Low Level Orchestrator of the domain, which is associated with a unique orchestration type (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker, containerd, etc.).

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be LowLevelOrchestrator

domain.description: Relationship. Domain to which the Low Level Orchestrator belongs.

orchestrationType.description: Property. Enum:'Kubernetes', 'Docker', 'containerd', 'Podman', 'iSulad'. Orchestration type of the Low Level Orchestrator, which is usually a container management framework.
